name: PowerSupply
description:
Within a dying facility, a humble power supply robot remains online. You must guide them through the facility to get the mainframe back online by reactivating powered down bots, using them to move the supply bot to the mainframe terminal. good luck

A game for GMTK Game Jam 2021 by Aeolus Studio & Sanity Games.

Art - Dylan McNeil

Music - Studio Mercy

Program - Charles Zhai
